text: mēlum uṅkaḷ maṉaiviyariliruntu evarēṉum uṅkaḷaiviṭṭut tappi, kāḥpirkaḷiṭam ceṉṟa piṉṉar, nīṅkaḷ pōrpporuḷkaḷai aṭaintāl, evarkaḷ maṉaiviyar ceṉṟu viṭṭaṉarō, avarkaḷukku avarkaḷ celavu ceytatu pōṉṟatai nīṅkaḷ koṭuṅkaḷ, aṉṟiyum, nīṅkaḷ evaṉ mītu nampikkai koṇṭu muḥmiṉkaḷāka irukkiṟīrkaḷō anta allāhvukku añci naṭantu koḷḷuṅkaḷ
